```{sql example-query, eval=FALSE}
SELECT SA.PERSON_ID,SA.SAMPLE_ID,SA.SAMPLE_FAMILY_ID
,CH1.CHOICE_NAME AS COLLECTION_CONSORTIUM 
,CH2.CHOICE_NAME AS CELFILE_RELATED
,CH3.CHOICE_NAME AS FROZEN_TUMOR_TISSUE
,CH4.CHOICE_NAME AS FROZEN_NORMAL_TISSUE
,CH5.CHOICE_NAME AS WHOLE_BLOOD
,CH6.CHOICE_NAME AS BUFFY_COAT
,CH7.CHOICE_NAME AS DNA_FROM_BLOOD
,CH8.CHOICE_NAME AS PLASMA
,CH9.CHOICE_NAME AS SERUM
,CH10.CHOICE_NAME AS PARAFFIN
,CH11.CHOICE_NAME AS URINE
,CH12.CHOICE_NAME AS RNA
,CH13.CHOICE_NAME AS MNC
,CH14.CHOICE_NAME AS DNA_FROM_SOLID
,CH15.CHOICE_NAME AS ADJACENT_NORMAL
,CH16.CHOICE_NAME AS LCS_PROTOCOL_BLOOD_AVA
,CH17.CHOICE_NAME AS SOO_CATEGORY
,CH36.CHOICE_NAME AS SOO_TISSUETYPE
,CH19.CHOICE_NAME AS HISTOLOGYCAP
,CH20.CHOICE_NAME AS PRIMARY_METASTATIC
,PI.MEDICAL_ID
,PI.PARTNER_ID
,CH21.Anatomic_Site AS SOO_ANATOMICSITE
,CH22.CHOICE_NAME AS GROSS_DIAGNOSIS
,CH23.CHOICE_NAME AS PRIMARY_SITE_PATIENT
,CH24.CHOICE_NAME AS HISTOLOGY_PATIENT
,CH25.CHOICE_NAME AS DERIVED_CATEGORY
,CH27.CHOICE_NAME AS DERIVED_TISSUETYPE
,SA.DERIVED_ANATOMIC_SITE AS DERIVED_ANATOMICSITE
,CH29.TISSUE_TYPE AS COL_SITE_TISSUE_TYPE
,SA.SPECIMEN_COLLECTION_DATE
,CH29.ANATOMIC_SITE AS COL_SITE_ANATOMIC
,CH30.CHOICE_NAME AS COL_SITE_CATEGORY
,SA.BIOBANKING_SUBJECT_ID AS SUBJECT_ID
,CH31.CHOICE_NAME AS WHOLE_EXOME
,CH32.CHOICE_NAME AS TARGET_EXOME
,CH33.CHOICE_NAME AS SAMPLE_TYPE
,SA.CURRENT_QUANTITY
,CH34.CHOICE_NAME AS PATH_DIAGNOSIS_PQC
,SA.SAMPLE_TO_CANR_CHAR_LINK
,CH35.CHOICE_NAME AS PROTOCOL

FROM ABC.SAMPLE SA
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH1 ON SA.COLLECTION_FACILITY = CH1.CHOICE_ID and ch1.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH2 ON SA.CELFILE_RELATED = CH2.CHOICE_ID and ch2.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.PATIENT_INFO PI ON SA.PARTY_ID = PI.PARTY_ID and pi.isdeleted = 0
LEFT JOIN ABC.SAMPLE_INDICATOR SI ON SA.SAMPLE_KEY = SI.SAMPLE_KEY and si.isdeleted = 0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH3 ON SI.FROZ_TTISE_AVL_FOR_RIND = CH3.CHOICE_ID and ch3.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH4 ON SI.FROZ_NORM_TISS_AVL_FOR_RIND = CH4.CHOICE_ID and ch4.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH5 ON SI.WHLBAVLFDNAEXTNDR_INCL_PAXDNAS = CH5.CHOICE_ID and ch5.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH6 ON SI.BUFY_COAT_AVL_FOR_RIND = CH6.CHOICE_ID and ch6.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH7 ON SI.DNAEXTRF_BLOD_AVL_FOR_RIND = CH7.CHOICE_ID and ch7.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH8 ON SI.PLA_AVL_FOR_RIND = CH8.CHOICE_ID and ch8.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH9 ON SI.SER_AVL_FOR_RIND = CH9.CHOICE_ID and ch9.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH10 ON SI.PARAF_BLK_AVL_FOR_RIND = CH10.CHOICE_ID and ch10.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH11 ON SI.UNINE_AVL_FOR_RIND = CH11.CHOICE_ID and ch11.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH12 ON SI.RNAEXTRF_SOLID_TTISE_FOR_RIND = CH12.CHOICE_ID and ch12.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH13 ON SI.MONO_CELS_EXTR_FOR_RIND = CH13.CHOICE_ID and ch13.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH14 ON SI.DNAEXTRF_SOLID_TTISE_FOR_RIND = CH14.CHOICE_ID and ch14.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH15 ON SI.ADJA_NSLD_SAMPLE_AVL_INDR = CH15.CHOICE_ID and ch15.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH16 ON SI.LCS_PROTC_BLOD_AVL_FOR_RIND = CH16.CHOICE_ID and ch16.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH17 ON SA.DERIVED_SOO_CATEGORY = CH17.CHOICE_ID and ch17.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH18 ON SA.DERIVED_SOO_TISSUE_TYPE = CH18.CHOICE_ID and ch18.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH19 ON SA.HISTOLOGY_TYPE_CONFORMED_CAP = CH19.CHOICE_ID and ch19.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH20 ON SA.DERIVED_PRIMARY_VS_METASTATIC = CH20.CHOICE_ID and ch20.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.TISSUE_TYPE CH21 ON SUBSTR(SA.DERIVED_SOO_ANATOMIC_SITE,0,8) = CH21.TISSUE_TYPE_KEY and ch21.isdeleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH22 ON SA.DERIVED_GROSS_DIAGNOSIS = CH22.CHOICE_ID and ch22.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH23 ON SA.PRIMARY_SITE_PATIENT = CH23.CHOICE_ID and ch23.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH24 ON SA.HISTOLOGY_PATIENT = CH24.CHOICE_ID and ch24.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH25 ON SA.DERIVED_CATEGORY = CH25.CHOICE_ID and ch25.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH26 ON SA.DERIVED_TISSUE_TYPE = CH26.CHOICE_ID and ch26.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH27 ON SA.DERIVED_TISSUE_TYPE = CH27.CHOICE_ID and ch27.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH28 ON SA.COLLECTION_SITE_TISSUE_TYPE = CH28.CHOICE_ID and ch28.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.TISSUE_TYPE CH29 ON SA.COLLECTION_SITE_ANATOMIC = CH29.TISSUE_TYPE_KEY and ch29.isdeleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH30 ON SA.COLLECTION_SITE_CATEGORY = CH30.CHOICE_ID and ch30.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH31 ON SI.WHL_EXOM_SEQ_AVL_INDR = CH31.CHOICE_ID and ch31.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH32 ON SI.TAR_EXOM_SEQ_AVL_INDR = CH32.CHOICE_ID and ch32.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH33 ON SA.SAMPLE_TYPE = CH33.CHOICE_ID and ch33.is_deleted=0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH34 ON SA.PATH_DIAGNOSIS_PQC = CH34.CHOICE_ID AND CH34.IS_DELETED = 0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH35 ON SA.PROTOCOL = CH35.CHOICE_ID AND CH35.IS_DELETED = 0
LEFT JOIN ABC.CHOICE CH36 ON SA.DERIVED_SOO_TISSUE_TYPE = CH36.CHOICE_ID AND CH36.IS_DELETED=0

WHERE SA.ISDELETED = 0
```

```{js echo=FALSE}
(function() {
  const btnDown = document.getElementById('sql-font-size-down')
  const btnUp = document.getElementById('sql-font-size-up')
  const btnFont = document.getElementById('sql-font-comic-sans')
  const code = document.querySelector('.word-doc pre code')
  let size = 100
  code.style.fontSize = size + '%'
  btnDown.addEventListener('click', function() {
    if (size <= 10) return;
    size = size - 10
    code.style.fontSize = size + '%'
  })
  btnUp.addEventListener('click', function() {
    if (size >= 100) return;
    size = size + 10
    code.style.fontSize = size + '%'
  })
  btnFont.addEventListener('click', function(ev) {
    if (btnFont.innerText === '') {
      btnFont.innerText = 'Comic Sans'
      code.style.fontFamily = '"Comic Sans MS", cursive, sans-serif'
    } else {
      btnFont.innerText = ''
      code.style.fontFamily = 'sans-serif'
    }
  })
})()
```
